Nov. 16, 2002 D SEWBBA (Treorchy) Contest (Third Section)
SEWBBA (Treorchy) Contest (Third Section) 30 Test Piece Contest SEWBBA (Treorchy) Contest sewbba-treorchy-contest-third-section
Test Piece Contest
Fanfare Diversions
Parc & Dare Theatre, Treorchy, Rhondda Cynon Taf, Wales, UK Best instrumentalist - cornet Abertillery. Prizes - 1st £150, 2nd £90 3rd £60. 6 bands competed
Dec. 8, 2014, 3:06 p.m. July 2, 2020, 12:13 p.m.
1 Briton Ferry Band Mike Faro
2 Abertillery & District Youth Eric Powell
3 Cross Keys Silver Band Kerry Bowden
4 Newbridge Celynen Band Paul Holland
5 Pontypool Brass Malcolm Jones
6 Severn Tunnel Band Rhodri Griffiths
Withdrawn Glynneath Silver Band William Cross
Withdrawn Llanelli Band Robert Owen
